title: Rain barrels reduce the flow of storm water runoff

content.description: A new 450-unit housing development will replace several small farms on the outskirts of Fremont. The development will be composed of 1/4-hectare lots with nearly identical footprints, as show below.
content.question: One important step that homeowners in the new development can take to protect water quality in Samel Creek would be to

choices.label: apply lawn fertilizers immediately before storm events
channelize Samel Creek to improve water flow during storm events
use only persistent organic pesticides to control weed species in their lawns
make certain that pet waste is disposed of directly into storm drains
use rain barrels to reduce the flow of storm water into the creek

content.answer: use rain barrels to reduce the flow of storm water into the creek
